EmailTemplate.subject: Watch: Honeywell n580 Navigator Used for 3D Mapping
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
As a global leader of high-performance non-ITAR inertial measurement units and navigators, we’re proud to showcase the work that is being done by our customers around the world.
Aeroscout, a UAV manufacturer and service provider in Switzerland, recently chose our HGuide n580 INS/GNSS navigator <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/navigation-and-sensors/hguide-n580]]> for its industrial unmanned helicopters equipped with LiDAR equipment to capture aerial point clouds to conduct powerline inspections, 3D mapping and surveillance worldwide.
You can learn more about Aeroscout and how they’re using our HGuide n580 in combination with LiDAR by watching this video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtD50Cd7ilY]]>.
We’re here to help you find the right IMU or navigator for your 3D mapping application.
For a limited time, you can try a Honeywell IMU or navigator before you buy*. Contact us today to learn more.
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/IMU_V1.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_imu_gh&utm_content=marketo]]>
*Try before you buy program is subject to availability and execution of Honeywell’s bailment agreement. Limit one (1) product per customer. Customer must return unit in 30 days from the time the unit is received. Customers who do not return the unit within 30 days will be charged full MSRP at standard Honeywell terms and conditions.
